title: League of Legends RP Hack - Updated!
description:
Sign up Using Hacked Link - Updated for August 15th

	1) Play though tutorial/1-2 games and get 450IP - Purchase Master Yi (important)
	
	2) Once you hit Level 3-4 Riot Gives you 400 RP - Purchase 3 Day XP Boost (Very Important)
		You can also stack the XP per Win Boost on top of day boost for even faster leveling!!!
	
	3) Make Custom Game - You are going to use Master Yi, Play Against Beginner Sona Bot on Twisted TreeLine
		Starting Equipment:
			- 1x Ichor of Rage
			- 5x Health Potion
			- 4x Mana Potion

		a) Go Bottom Lane, as Sona Will always go top
		Intercept the wave before it reaches their outer turret, use your ichor of rage
		Use Smite only on siege units (the big ones)
		
		Skill Order for Master Yi - Q, W, Q, E, Q, R - whatever
		Runes: Purchase Attack Damage Runes (Non-Scaling) for all slots
		Spells: Smite (for killing siege units faster); Teleport - incase you die or have to port back once

		
		<Important>
		Once you blow up the second turret, Sona Bot will warp back to base, you can pretty much ignore her as she can only poke at you and run away. Just use a Health potion or W skill
		and keep whacking away. 

		<Very Important!!!!!!>
		DO NOT END THE GAME BEFORE 5MINS!! - Yes, This is very likely and what you are shooting for and can be easily done. You won't get near the xp if you do. Wait to blow up the nexus
		until after the 5 min mark.

		Game Length: Typically 5-7mins per game
		XP: Currently Getting 100+ xp per game with only 3Day XP Boost

		<Alternative>
		If you are skilled and have buddies you can do a 3v3 Intermediate Bot Twisted Treeline Game using all AD Ranged (Ashe, Vayne, Sivir, etc...) and follow same principal for even more xp. Same 
		Rules above still apply though!!! Do not end game before 5 min mark.

	4) Rinse and Repeat - Should take you about 1 Day to reach it, or faster depending on your effeciency and if you do intermediate bot games or not as you get more xp for harder games.
